ing: 2 cups strong brewed coffee, room temperature
des: "A low calorie milkshake that can be modified to produce a variety of flavors, and is a great use for leftover coffee.  Use different flavors of hot cocoa mix to make different flavored milkshakes."
ins: In the container of a blender, combine the coffee, milk, hot cocoa mix, sugar, banana, vanilla and ice cubes. Cover and blend until smooth and frothy. Pour into glasses and serve immediately.
